name: tethering
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the use of a mobile phone as a wireless internet connection to which you can connect other devices: I've been using wi-fi tethering through my mobile phone. Tethering lets mobile phone owners use their devices as modems for other devices.
More examplesFewer examplesDoes this phone support wi-fi tethering?See if you have the internet tethering option available in settings. People who love using their handset with their computers will love the savings that free mobile tethering can give.
